content: 3 double_crochet s in one stitch on the next petal 2 bpdc around the next stitches 1 bphdc around the next stitch don t close the round with a slip_stitch round #47 make slip stitches in the back loop all around to get a nice edge the end if you make the christmas 2021 carpet please send me its photo with some details about yourself like your name and where you re from i m curious to know how far my designs travel www facebook com/magiccarpetstudio/ www magiccarpetstudio blogspot com check out my other carpets http //magiccarpetstudio blogspot com/p/portfolio html magic carpet studio www facebook com/magiccarpetstudio/ www magiccarpetstudio blogspot com
